title: How do I turn off restricted mode activated by the "network administrator" (don't have one) on YouTube in Firefox
content:
Hi guys,

I'm on my personal computer and personal account and my "network administrator" (which I don't have) has turned on restricted mode in YouTube so I can't read comments on videos etc. I know I need to change my browser security settings, but I don't know to what exactly. Can anyone help? The restricted mode is infuriating me.
creator: maria_mcgivern
